document_data.Description: Pilea had shoulder-length brown hair and gray eyes. She wore a bright blue and white [[robe]] and pants outfit, and fingerless [[gloves]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Pilea was a senior member of the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|forward camp]] outside the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She provided expertise on the subject of the malfunctioning ''mythal'', which could be seen flashing in the sky overhead and was responsible for many of the dangers within the city.
